nodes.title: Router
nodes.desc: A device that connects multiple computer networks together and routes traffic between them, using network address translation (NAT) and other techniques to ensure efficient data transfer. [Cisco](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/index.html)

nodes.title: Switch
nodes.desc: A device that connects multiple devices within a network and forwards data packets between them, using MAC addresses to ensure efficient data transfer. [HP](https://www.hpe.com/us/en/networking/switches.html)

nodes.title: Load Balancer
nodes.desc: A device that distributes incoming network traffic across multiple servers to improve responsiveness and reliability. [F5](https://www.f5.com/products/big-ip/load-balancing)

nodes.title: Intrusion Detection System (IDS)
nodes.desc: A device that monitors network traffic for signs of unauthorized access or malicious activity, alerting administrators to potential security threats. [IBM](https://www.ibm.com/security/intrusion-detection-systems)

nodes.title: Virtual Private Network (VPN) Concentrator
nodes.desc: A device that connects multiple VPNs together and manages VPN connections, using encryption and other techniques to ensure secure data transfer. [Cisco](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/security/vpn-concentrators/index.html)

nodes.title: Network Tap
nodes.desc: A device that connects to a network and provides a copy of all network traffic to a monitoring device, without disrupting network traffic. [Gigamon](https://www.gigamon.com/products/network-taps.html)

nodes.title: Packet Sniffer
nodes.desc: A device that captures and analyzes network traffic, providing detailed information about network protocols and data transfer. [Wireshark](https://www.wireshark.org/)

nodes.title: Network Analyzer
nodes.desc: A device that monitors and analyzes network traffic, providing detailed information about network performance and data transfer. [SolarWinds](https://www.solarwinds.com/products/network_analyzer)

nodes.title: Hub
nodes.desc: A simple network device that connects multiple devices together and broadcasts incoming data to all connected devices, without performing any routing or switching functions. [D-Link](https://www.dlink.com/en/products/hubs)

nodes.title: Modem
nodes.desc: A device that connects a local area network (LAN) to a wide area network (WAN) and modulates and demodulates signals to facilitate data transfer over the internet. [Netgear](https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/modems/)

nodes.title: Bridge
nodes.desc: A device that connects two or more networks together and filters traffic between them, using MAC addresses to ensure efficient data transfer. [Juniper](https://www.juniper.net/us/en/products/networking/bridging.html)

nodes.title: Gateway
nodes.desc: A device that connects a local area network (LAN) to a wide area network (WAN) and routes traffic between them, using network address translation (NAT) and other techniques to ensure efficient data transfer. [Fortinet](https://www.fortinet.com/products/gateways.html)

nodes.title: Firewall
nodes.desc: A device that monitors and controls incoming and outgoing network traffic based on predetermined security rules, blocking unauthorized access to the network. [Palo Alto](https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/products/firewall)

nodes.title: Network Interface Card (NIC)
nodes.desc: A hardware component that connects a device to a network and provides a physical connection to the network, using protocols such as Ethernet or Wi-Fi. [Intel](https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/products/network-io/ethernet.html)

nodes.title: Wireless Access Point (WAP)
nodes.desc: A device that connects wireless devices to a network and provides a physical connection to the network, using protocols such as Wi-Fi. [Cisco](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/wireless/wireless-access-points/index.html)

nodes.title: Network Attached Storage (NAS)
nodes.desc: A device that provides shared access to files and folders over a network, using protocols such as SMB or NFS. [Synology](https://www.synology.com/en-us/products/network_attached_storage)
